Method Detail

configureGUI

private void configureGUI(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell shell)
This method creates the GUI with StackLayouts for all 3 modes.

Parameters:
shell - the shell used as parent for the whole application

setBackground

private void setBackground(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell shell)
This method makes the gui a lot nicer and sets a nice background to all composites used in this gui

Parameters:
shell - the shell where the background should be set

refreshBackground

private void refreshBackground(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell shell)
This method recalculates the background. Normally used when a resze event occured

Parameters:
shell - the shell used to refresh the background on

addButtons

private void addButtons(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent)
Adds the menu to the given composite with centralized buttons to control the recorder. side effect: the composite #menuBarDefaultComp is set so that the menubar can easily be connected/disconnected to this composit

Parameters:
parent - the parent composite where the menu-buttons should be added

addHiddenField

private void addHiddenField(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite comp)
creates a hidden field on the given Composite. This field is to be used in a GridLayout and grabs horizontal space

Parameters:
comp - Composite, where the hidden field should be created at

disconnect

private void disconnect()
stops the connection

run

public void run()
Runs the gui, until it is closed by a user. This Method will first return, when the window is disposed Will fail, if the GUI was not initialized by using the method init().

init

public void init()
Initializes all the GUI parts and has to be called before using the run() method. Will also set the display variable in this gui.
